issue.title: CMake Error - C++14 support for the library

content.raw: Indeed, [variable templates are not available until gcc-5](https://gcc.gnu.org/projects/cxx-status.html#cxx14). The minimum version of Ubuntu that is supported by the latest version of Gazebo is Xenial (16.04) which offers `gcc-5`. If you're using Ubuntu 16.04, try to `apt-get install` `gcc-5` and `g++-5`. If you're using an older version of Ubuntu, you might need to build an older version of Gazebo from source.
content.html: Indeed, variable templates are not available until gcc-5. The minimum version of Ubuntu that is supported by the latest version of Gazebo is Xenial (16.04) which offers gcc-5. If you're using Ubuntu 16.04, try to apt-get install gcc-5 and g++-5. If you're using an older version of Ubuntu, you might need to build an older version of Gazebo from source.
